mf_17¶

cosmerge.sfh.mf_17(z)¶

The Madau & Fragos (2017) star formation rate per comoving volume as a function of redshift

Parameters
zfloat or numpy.array

redshift

Returns
sfrfloat or numpy.array

star formation rate per comoving volume at redshift z with astropy units
